comment: Closure law for addition in the real subfield of complex numbers. Axiom 5 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory. This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly, nor should the proven axiom ~ ax-addrcl be used later. Instead, in most cases use ~ readdcl . (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)
